text.text: The bolt-python repository has the following size characteristics:

‣ *Total repository size*: 27 MB
‣ *Git directory (.git)*: 13 MB
‣ *Source code and files*: ~14 MB

‣ *Non-git files*: 1,024 files
‣ *Total files* (including git objects): 1,052 files
So the actual source code, documentation, examples, and tests make up about 14 MB, while the git history accounts for about 13 MB of the total size.
